participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, with a curious mind.
participant_1.background: i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry. i try various coffees as a hobby. i'm a huge star wars fan.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: nurturing and creative, with a love for nature.
participant_2.background: i am a woman. i have a dog. i attend church every week. i work as a school teacher. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.

content.text: hi, how are you? I just got back from a college division for poetry
Cool. I'm going to the church in a while.
that is cool. I am going to be a star wars player. you?
I love poetry. I am a fan of star wars. what about you?
I don't like any of those
I love star wars. what is your favorite food? mine is poetry. you?
I eat a lot of poetry. I try to be as various as I can
Do you cook it or just eat it as is?
I do. I love it. what do you do for a living? I am in college
